Uses of Package
org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api

  • Packages that use org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api 
    Package Description
    org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api  
    org.apache.taverna.platform.run.impl  
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api used by org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api 
    Class and Description
    InvalidRunIdException
    Thrown when a runID is not valid for the RunService.
    RunProfile
    A RunProfile specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow.
    RunProfileException
    Thrown when a RunProfile doesn't contain the correct components to run a workflow.
    RunStateException
    Thrown when an operation is attempted when a workflow is in the wrong state, e.g., resuming a workflow that is not paused.
  • Classes in org.apache.taverna.platform.run.api used by org.apache.taverna.platform.run.impl 
    Class and Description
    InvalidRunIdException
    Thrown when a runID is not valid for the RunService.
    RunProfile
    A RunProfile specifies the parameters required to run a Workflow.
    RunProfileException
    Thrown when a RunProfile doesn't contain the correct components to run a workflow.
    RunService
    Service for managing runs of Taverna workflows.
    RunStateException
    Thrown when an operation is attempted when a workflow is in the wrong state, e.g., resuming a workflow that is not paused.
